DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Split Cake, 50 gm - Large Tacolicious
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX 50 gm Split Cakes create colorful face paint designs in just a few strokes. Ideal for festivals, fairs or birthday parties. Pick up multiple colors at once using a face painting sponge or a big brush and create fast, multi-color designs. Diamond FX stays all day without fading or cracking.
FDA does not recommend using Diamond FX Reds, Blues (including Greens and Purples) and Neon Colors around eyes and lips. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
Includes colors: Black, Gold, Orange, Neon Yellow. Works equally well for boy designs and girl designs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Split Cakes are perfect for creating colorful designs with just a few brush strokes.
Ideal for quickly creating colorful designs for boys or girls.
Includes colors: Black, Gold, Orange, Neon Yellow.
Each 1.76 ounces (50 gm) Diamond FX Split Cake is good for 100-250 applications.
FDA does not recommend use of Diamond FX Neon Colors, Reds and Blues (including Greens and Purples) around eyes and lips

FDA does not recommend using Diamond FX Reds, Blues (including Greens and Purples) and Neon Colors around eyes and lips. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
Includes colors: Dark Blue, Blue, Light Blue, White. Create winter, ocean, sea and other underwater elements.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Split Cakes are perfect for creating colorful designs with just a few brush strokes.
Perfect for ocean designs, sky and winter designs.
Includes colors: Dark Blue, Blue, Light Blue, White.
Each 30 gm Diamond FX Split Cake is good for 60-150 applications.
FDA does not recommend use of Diamond FX Neon Colors, Reds and Blues (including Greens and Purples) around eyes and lips

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Essential - Green (50 g)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Essential Green Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based professional face paint. Renders lively colors and provides solid coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking. Diamond FX maintains brightness and density even when painted over other colors. Diamond FX Essential is ideal for blending, layering or line work. Requires only a small amount of water. Hypo-allergenic and non-toxic; free of perfumes.
Diamond FX is manufactured according to the EEC and FDA regulations. Tested in the Netherlands. FDA does not recommend using reds and blues (this includes greens and purples) around the eye and lip area or leaving them on the skin for long. Avoid contact with upholstery, fabric and carpets.
Comes in 50 gm size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that is perfect for line work, blending or layering.
Provides superb, opaque coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking.
Ideal for St Patrick's Day themed designs, monsters and snakes.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 1.76 ounces (50 gm) Face Paint Container is good for 100-250 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Split Cake, 50 gm - Large Mega Melon
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX 50 gm Split Cakes create colorful face paint designs in just a few strokes. Ideal for festivals, fairs or birthday parties. Pick up multiple colors at once using a face painting sponge or a big brush and create fast, multi-color designs. Diamond FX stays all day without fading or cracking.
FDA does not recommend using Diamond FX Reds, Blues (including Greens and Purples) and Neon Colors around eyes and lips. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
Includes colors: Bordeaux Red, Pink, White, Mint Green, Light Green, Dark Green. Works equally well for designs for boys and girls. The Green spectrum works great for snakes, monsters etc and the red spectrum is ideal for princesses, butterflies etc.

FDA does not recommend using Diamond FX Reds, Blues (including Greens and Purples) and Neon Colors around eyes and lips. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.

DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Split Cakes are perfect for creating colorful designs with just a few brush strokes.
Perfect for parties, fairs and festivals.
Includes colors: Metallic Baby Blue, Metallic Green, Metallic Purple, Metallic Old Gold.
Each 30 gm Diamond FX Split Cake is good for 60-150 applications.
FDA does not recommend use of Diamond FX Neon Colors, Reds and Blues (including Greens and Purples) around eyes and lips

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Essential - Light Blue (50 g)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Essential Light Blue Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based professional face paint. Renders lively colors and provides solid coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking. Diamond FX maintains brightness and density even when painted over other colors. Diamond FX Essential is ideal for blending, layering or line work. Requires only a small amount of water. Hypo-allergenic and non-toxic; free of perfumes.
Diamond FX is manufactured according to the EEC and FDA regulations. Tested in the Netherlands. FDA does not recommend using reds and blues (this includes greens and purples) around the eye and lip area or leaving them on the skin for long. Avoid contact with upholstery, fabric and carpets.
Comes in 50 gm size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that is perfect for line work, blending or layering.
Provides superb, opaque coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking.
Perfect for creating dolphin, sea, sky or winter designs.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 1.76 ounces (50 gm) Face Paint Container is good for 100-250 applications
